main event: A civilian observed three oval-shaped unidentified flying objects with blue-white flames in Crane, Indiana on October 10, 1954.
interesting points: The objects emitted a barely audible sound and were observed for 3-5 seconds., The objects were approximately 75 feet in length and traveled at a high speed., The direction of movement was NW by N., The observer described the flames as brilliant and bluish-white., There was no known air traffic in the area at the time of the sighting.
